interestingFact: Interesting Fact: There are 195 countries in the world today, including 193 United Nations member states and 2 observer states.
India is the world's largest democracy and home to over 22 official languages.
Tokyo is the most populous capital city in the world.
Brazil is the only country in South America that speaks Portuguese.
Germany is Europe's largest economy and known for its engineering excellence.
Australia is home to more kangaroos than people.
Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.
Egypt is home to the Great Pyramid of Giza, the only remaining ancient wonder.
France is the most visited country in the world.
South Africa has three capital cities: Pretoria, Cape Town, and Bloemfontein.
Mexico City was built on the ruins of the ancient Aztec capital, Tenochtitlán.
